text: Robert Carmichael (born 1885) was a Scottish footballer who played for Sunderland, St Mirren, Oldham Athletic, Third Lanark, Clyde and Dumbarton. ==References== Category:1885 births Category:Scottish footballers Category:Dumbarton F.C. players Category:Clyde F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:English Football League players Category:Date of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Baillieston Juniors F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:St Mirren F.C. players Category:Oldham Athletic A.F.C. players Category:Third Lanark A.C. players Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Footballers from Paisley, Renfrewshire
title: Robert Carmichael (footballer)
